website_summaries.verdict: In your time of sorrow, this pet urn offers the elegance and design that will spark your fond memories and provide a peaceful final resting place.
pros: Crafted in strong, solid brass that can be engraved for personalizing with your pet's name and dates
4 sizes accommodate small to extra large pets
Has paw prints on the enamel finish
Lid screws on tightly for a secure fit
cons: A few reports of defects on the finish, and some size discrepancies

customer_reviews.title: The perfect final resting place for you beloved pet.
customer_reviews.text: My cat of 17 years died recently. I had always promised that when the time came i would have him cremated so I would always be able to keep him near. This urn is perfect. It is very well constructed- very heavy weight and holds all of his ashes. It makes a nice decorative piece on the mantle. I would give anything to have him back, but at least I still have him close by. It can also be engraved on the top or back where there are no paw prints. If you found this review in any way helpful, please take a moment and hit the button. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree

customer_reviews.title: Stately Urn for your Departed Pet. Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely urn, perfect for the remains of my wonderful and loyal dog, Frodo, who sadly passed away a few months ago, after having 13 wonderful years with him. I chose the XL, even though he weighed about 75 lbs. I wanted a tall urn, one that was fitting for him. Here is a photo of the urn next to the urn of his Cat Companion in life, Ari, who sadly, also passed away after a long life, recently. I am able to get some comfort by seeing these urns, with their remains, close by.
customer_reviews.author: Liz FlaglerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Paint chips right off!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. The white is painted on so it chips. You absolutely cannot get this engraved because of the paint. The engraver turned me away when she saw the terrible quality. If you get this, get a metal without paint.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely beautiful urn. This was a very difficult purchase to make and I searched and searched for just the perfect urn to buy for my sweet boy of 12 years and am so glad I bought this one! It is perfect! Wonderful quality, a good, heavy urn, was packaged well, so there is no scratches on it anywhere. Just a nice addition to sit up in our living room and keep the ashes of our Siberian Husky in. He meant the world to us and this is a wonderful way to pay tribute to the joy he brought to our lives every day. If you are undecided, you won't be sorry if you buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Shelia Raley

customer_reviews.title: A much more suitable repository for my long time friend.
customer_reviews.text: At the time our beloved Doozer passed, I wasn’t offered much in the way of alternatives and really hadn’t considered any. Once I decided to look into it, I discovered his ashes were in a plastic bag inside the original pottery vessel which made transferring them to a new urn a simple matter. This beautifully crafted repository is much more befitting our loving, devoted friend and better expresses our herart-felt rememberance of the many times spent in each other’s company. The addition of a customized name plate completes our final gift to our good and loyal friend, until we meet again.
customer_reviews.author: alfisch

customer_reviews.title: Lovely urn
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this five stars but there was a mix up with my order. I ordered the black urn with silver paws circling the top of the urn, what I received was the black urn with white painted paws going up one side. A mix up like that isn't easy to handle when you're grieving. Luckily, for me, I had been torn between the two urns when I purchased. The urn I received seemed better suited for my bur baby though. Overall, it's a beautiful urn that I will be able to look at fondly while remembering my beloved Sweetie. She will be missed forever.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful URN, Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Albeit a bit difficult to state loving this product, due to the purpose of the purchase, it is a wonderful Urn. Excellent quality, beautiful coloring, looks very nice in my formal living room. I highly recommend this brand and company ---- I have no reservations and will utilize them again. (Sharing w/you personal comment - the pet now in this urn and the one still living were inseparable. Due to the mourning of the survivor, I purposely ordered this size urn. It is large enough to place the survivor in with her sister, when her time comes).
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Urn for a beloved Pet
customer_reviews.text: I wanted my beloved Great Dane to have a beautiful final resting place. I looked at a number of urns before choosing this one. It is exactly as the picture. It also comes with a velvet carrying bag, if I ever have to pack the urn. It was exactly the size I needed and there was room for all the ashes. I will buy another when my other beloved Great Dane needs a final resting place.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby M. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, well-made, piece of art
customer_reviews.text: This was beyond what I expected. Beautiful coloring, excellent craftmanship and very sturdy. It is one of the many urns we have honoring our beloved furkids. There were many, many styles and colors to chose from. This pet was 85 pounds and we had no issues fitting the cremains in the urn. I have ordered others that were way to small; this was just as it said. When, unfortunately, I have to order another, I will definitely order another of these and in fact, I may replace some of the others I have. Price is extremely reasonable for quality and beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Bessette

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful urn.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this urn, I got the small and it's just the right size for my Chihuahua Sophie, she was 7 lbs. 5 oz. The bag with her ashes fit into the small opening which is 2 1/8. The screw top is a little tricky but if you don't force things it goes on nicely. Now I just have to cope with losing my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Sue H

customer_reviews.title: What a beautiful resting place for my furbaby
customer_reviews.text: I was told several weeks ago my little cocker , Maddy, would not be with us much longer. She will be 14yrs next week. We adopted her at 5 yrs old. She will join her 7 sisters at Rainbow Bridge. They all have their place in our home. I struggled to decide on the color because we have 7 urns and I wanted this one to be different. The white with gold paws is PERFECT. Our dogs are family members and I wanted her final resting place to be AWESOME 💔🐾💔🐾💔 🐾
customer_reviews.author: G. Green

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our dearly departed sled dog. RIP Roca.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and crafted from a heavy metal. The lid screws on tightly so you don’t have to worry about little kids getting into it or knocking it over and spilling out your beloved pets remains onto the carpet. Came carefully packaged and even had a velvet bag that you can fit the urn into for travel. It looks very modern and timeless upon the shelf, and the neck of the container is a perfect size for wrapping a necklace chain around with dog tags attached. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Creeper

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful for my passed kitty♡
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful. I cried when I opened it. My kitty Jasmyne would absolutely find this to be fitting for her final resting place next to her momma with me everyday. Thank you Beat Friend Services Ottillie Paws for providing such a quality and BEAUTIFUL product for during such a delicate and sad time in any pet owners life. Thank you. It's absolutely perfect. The top is screw on and it's very sturdy, the design I can tell was made with absolute care. Thank you so much. I'd like to add some pictures but it doesn't have a section where I can add pictures for others wanting to see how amazing this is for our furbabies passed.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: A Beautiful Final Resting Place
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my precious 16-year old Boston Terrier the day she passed. I received it in just a few days and I was in awe of it's beauty. My Penny was 18 lbs. in weight, and her ashes fit with room to spare in the small size. It is the most beautiful urn, and the paw prints were such a sweet touch. It is displayed with honor next to her picture. A fitting tribute for my precious Penny.
customer_reviews.author: Lori K.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, good weight and secure lid
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece. It is made in India and has a heavier weight than I anticipated which is a nice surprise. No worries about it being too light with my girl's ashes inside that a cat can knock her off the mantel. The top cap screws on so no need for glue or other sealant to keep ashes safe. My Sparkle was a 74# large boned Golden Retriever and keeping her remains in a bag there is more than enough room with decent room to spare. If your fur baby was my girl's weight or thereabouts I hope that info helps.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Tasteful, classy, doesn't scream "URN"
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the small size gold urn and it's PERFECT for my cat. Saying goodbye to my baby girl was one of THE HARDEST things I've ever gone through and I'm glad I was able to give her a beautiful final resting place. The design is tasteful, classy, and doesn't scream "URN" like other (ugly) urns. The first one I ordered didn't screw properly, but amazon/the company were great and sent me a replacement within 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful final resting place for a beautiful dog
customer_reviews.text: I breaks my heart to write this right now but I searched and searched for a beautiful resting place for my beloved corgi girl Shorty! She was the light of my life and I wanted something special for her. She was a homebody and I wanted to keep her her with me. This urn in really pretty and seals up nicely. I feel really sorry for anyone having to search for this. It’s terrible and heartbreaking but I am really satisfied with this unfortunate purchase. I know she will be beautifully displayed on our mantel and never far from our hearts
customer_reviews.author: cathy  w

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Detailed Crafted Urn
customer_reviews.text: A high quality, detailed craftsmanship, no price gouging urn for your fur babies. Has a good weight to it, very well made, and balanced. Last but not least, the color is as expected. Selected for the wide mouth for functionality so I did not have to take her ashes out of the bag or seal the urn because it has threaded screw top. You will feel the love for your little Sweeties is well maintained by the beauty of this urn. 🐾🐾🐶🐕🐕💞
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Robin C. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Most Elegant Looking for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I lost my best friend at the young age of five from liver cancer. I had her cremated and even though her remains came in a nice wooden box, I felt that this looks a lot better. RIP my little friend as you'll always be with me. She was a brave little mix dog mixed (Airdale and hound) which I got from the Humane Society at 3 months old. She had been severely beaten up by other dogs that were trying to kill her but somehow survived. She had bite marks all over her body, legs, ears and was nothing but skin and bones when I got her. Hopefully, I gave her the best 5 years of her life.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Thiel

customer_reviews.title: Best Urn for your passed pets!!
customer_reviews.text: We recently had to say goodbye to one of our labs due to old age and we got this for her ashes. This is very high quality and heavy duty. We weren't expecting something with such a great finish. Everyone that see's it loves it and askes us where we purchased it. Will def be buying more in the future!!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Craftsmanship and quality
customer_reviews.text: The craftsmanship of this urn is top quality ! The finish is exquisite. You will not be disappointed with this urn. If you treasure your beloved pets as much as I do. Buy this urn.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful final touch!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful pet burial urn. We have several pets waiting for urns like this. Until now, we just kept their ashes in the containers provided by the vet services we've used. Most of those are pretty basic. This urn is heavy, very well made, and it looks very nice, too. In all, we had 5 pets that have passed over the years, and I finally made the decision to get decent urns for all of them. I ordered this one to make sure it was up to my standard. It certainly is, so I will be ordering more from this vendor for the remaining dogs and cats that have been members of our family.
customer_reviews.author: QuietType

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is so beautiful. I'm very surprised at the high quality and simply gorgeous color. I got the medium so my little guys could eventually be together again in one place. It's the perfect size if you have small dogs or cats. I placed the urn on a small corner table with a picture and my little guy's collar and a candle. It brings me solace in this difficult time. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: You'd think there'd be better quality control on an item like this seeing as ...
customer_reviews.text: As many of the previous reviewers stated I received the wrong color. The paw print carving was rather shoddy also as others have stated. You'd think there'd be better quality control on an item like this seeing as how customers order this because they've lost a beloved pet. Last thing we need is further hassle, stress, annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: DoxieGirl77

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!! Highly recommend....
customer_reviews.text: During a very hard time this urn made me smile. It is everything I wanted it to be. Very well crafted, not one imperfection. Heavy, and strong, it is worth way more than what they sell them for. I am so pleased. I couldn't have asked for a better urn for my beloved fur baby. I highly recommend this to anyone suffering the loss of their pet. It's perfect! It also came with a purple velvet pouch, that I wasn't expecting, bonus!!
customer_reviews.author: QueenofSpades

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted, high-quality urn.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mother for her dog after cremation. Her pup was truly her best friend and I wanted her to be able to look at something that was as beautiful as her pooch. I was surprised at the quality and color itself. The colors of the urn were vibrant and the paw prints were etched so precisely. The lid screws on tight so there is no worry of it coming open at any point.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Jane

customer_reviews.title: Purchased in advance
customer_reviews.text: I bought this urn as my cat just turned 20 and I’d rather be prepared and have it than not. It feels solid and quite hefty, so I know his ashes will be safe inside. I showed it to him, but he didn’t seem to really care about it. Just stared at me quizzically wondering when I’m going to give him some treats. I like the look of it and I’m comforted knowing I’m prepared. I tucked the money for his cremation services inside for now.
customer_reviews.author: D. Giff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my fur baby!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this urn!! Half the price as the ones at the crematory. Wonderful craftsmanship!! Looks better in person then in the pictures!! I wanted something really nice for my sweet dog who was loved by our whole family!! He was 85 lbs & I purchased the large one & it fit perfect with extra room to spare. It came faster then initially scheduled. Will order another one when my other fur baby passes away.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for 14 lb dog who was Aquamated
customer_reviews.text: My dog went through Aquamation and the ashes that were returned to me were a smooth white ash that fit perfectly in the small urn. Ashes received from the Aquamation process are more than the cremation process so keep that in mind when ordering an urn. Had my dog been any bigger I would have had to go to the medium sized urn. The small urn came with a velvet bag which was a special touch.
customer_reviews.author: DMMEXEC

customer_reviews.title: BeaUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: I was determined to find an urn for my fur baby Zoey after she was cremated and this urn is perfect. It is very classy and sophisticated just like she was and I am glad amazon was able to provide
customer_reviews.author: agarza1k

customer_reviews.title: Quality at any affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Incredible urn at an amazing price! I was very please when I opened the box this urn came in, it is absolutely gorgeous! The color, the finish, everything is very well made and sure to last us many years. Our precious Emily cat passed away yesterday and we will be placing her in this urn soon. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Damnediscoman

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Please read the other reviews and don’t waste your money. This product has horrific craftsmanship. The paw prints have chipping all around the outline and the actual urn itself arrived with numerous scratches and deep scuffs all over it. This company clearly has zero quality control and it’s super upsetting considering what they’re selling. I truly wouldn’t recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and fitting of my Golden Retriever Hercules.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and fitting of my Golden Retriever Hercules. I was looking for something that would match the color of his hair and this was perfect. His passing is a little bit easier to bear knowing his finale remains are in this wonderful urn and his soul is near me once again. Heavy duty and well worth the price I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Parkington

customer_reviews.title: *** Gorgeous and solid final resting place for your furry loved one ***
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully crafted urn; the perfect final resting place for my beloved 17-year old Australian Kelpie, Maggie. Maggie was around 30 lbs when she passed and her ashes fit into the small urn with about an inch of room to spare. This is a very solid, very nicely finished brass piece with silver (pewter) paw prints around the perimeter. The top screws on and appears to seal the urn well.
customer_reviews.author: Pj

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Memories
customer_reviews.text: This marine green urn is bright, beautiful, and epitomizes everything good in this world to me---EXACTLY what I needed to remind me of my precious best friend and "child" whose ashes are now inside. I was hoping I wouldn't have to use it for another few years, but I'm glad I had finally found the perfect one prior to my elderly baby's passing. Even the pet crematorium staff remarked upon its beauty and quality. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Another Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Superb urn!
customer_reviews.text: Really lovely urn! Made well and I'm confident my dear Ugar's ashes are well kept and beautifully displayed in this urn. My only criticism is that the opening was a bit narrow and I had to painfully shove the bag of ashes inside. Glad it worked out because I don't think I could get them back out again. Lovely color! Well packaged. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Yates

customer_reviews.title: I really do like the urn
customer_reviews.text: I really do like the urn. My Dodger was a 17lb Lhaso Apso. I bought the small urn thinking I could fit his ashes as well as the bag into the urn. Not happening. I could probably get the ashes in if I take them out of the bag but I didn't want to do that. I bought the urn because it said it would hold up to a 30lb dog and another person said their 20lb dog fit in the urn along with the bag. Not even close. Not sure yet if I will keep the urn or return it.
customer_reviews.author: Husker Fan

customer_reviews.title: Lovely sturdy urn.
customer_reviews.text: I never ever wanted to buy this product. However it is a beautiful urn to hold my beloved fur baby Bandits ashes. It sits next to his photo, foot print and colar proudly displayed. This sturdy urn is a beautiful tribute to our four footed family members.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Lass

customer_reviews.title: opinion
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised upon receiving this. For the price I was expecting something of a lower quality. I don't have a weight scale. I know it weighted more than a few pounds. Appears to be handcrafted solid brass, with a lacquer finish. I hope in this lifetime I never have to purchase another one. For those who really care for our four legged lifetime friends in life, this would be an appropriate final resting place. And I really miss my best friend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought the medium for my 25lb beagle. She fit in it just fine with room to spare. The urn itself is heavy and very well made. No scratches or dents or anything like that. I'm glad that the lid screws on, so I don't have to worry about spillage if it were to get knocked off the shelf it sits on. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leeta B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Urn for My Angel!
customer_reviews.text: I lost my Pitbull due to Cancer a few months ago in August and purchased this when I got her ashes. Such a beautiful Urn. She weighed 50 pounds so I ordered a Medium. Fit perfectly and looks so pretty. I might add some rhinestones on it when I get the time.
customer_reviews.author: C Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Obviously this was needed at an emotional time. The exact same urn was more than three times the price through the company that handled my dog's remains. Nice to have someone not take advantage of the love we have for our pets.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Dunaway

customer_reviews.title: pretty urn
customer_reviews.text: I love it . The color and quality are beautiful . I lost my little man 3 days ago. I was not in the mood to write a review. But I was so worried about the quality without being able to see and " touch " it. It had to be very special for my baby's final resting place. I am so pleased with my decision For everyone considering this urn I am so sorry for your loss . I would definitely buy it
customer_reviews.author: ziggyv

customer_reviews.title: Good item, sad I had to pick it out
customer_reviews.text: This was an extremely hard item to pick out, since I lost my baby a few weeks ago. It has a screw on top, which I like in case it ever got knocked over. It's heavy and well made. The items was also packaged well and arrived right on time. My sweet baby weighed about 24 pounds, so the small was perfect. Plus, I also had her blanket with her when I had to let go over her. :( I had seen other urns, but this one seemed well made and had good reviews, so I would recommend it to someone else. Plus, I can buy a frame I like and put her picture right beside of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase! It is heavy and made beautifully. I would recommend this product for sure. Not only that, the customer service was amazing. I had to return the first was because it was not large enough. The company contacted me right away to find out why I returned it and if there was a problem. I will definitely order this again when the time comes for my cat.
customer_reviews.author: CindyKr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and half the cost from funeral home or cremation facility.
customer_reviews.text: This far exceeded my expectations. I bought a large to add my other two pups when their time comes. It is stunning and well made. Do not let the cremation facility or funeral home rip you off when you can get at least half price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: John Adams

customer_reviews.title: I found this one and loved that it kinda matched my pets fur colors
customer_reviews.text: We unexpectedly lost our dog so we didn't have much time to really research urns. I found this one and loved that it kinda matched my pets fur colors. It was delivered very quickly and well packaged. Tried to get it engraved but unfortunately they weren't able to at Things Remembered. They didn't want to risk the surface paint from chipping during the engraving process. So we got a small dog tag instead with our pets info and used her collar around the urn. Of course I would've loved not to have to purchase but we love it very much- it is well designed and heavy for the size (we got smallest size). Our pet was 7-9 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Better than I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: It is not cheap plastic it is made of real Brass. Worth putting my poor boys ashes in. Even the threads for the top are well made. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Heberlein

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Vessel for our Best Friend
customer_reviews.text: Stunning! I bought the medium and my boy was about 65 lbs when he passed. The size was perfect for our shelving and it sits right by his paw print. The finish and design is as good as I’ve seen and less expensive than the cremation companies. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ZepMag

customer_reviews.title: Well-made and Beautiful Urn
customer_reviews.text: The urn is a perfect memorial for my dear sweet James. It is well made and looks beautiful sitting on the mantel. James was a 40 pound Cardigan Welsh Corgi. The medium was bigger than I needed for him, but I actually like this size. When I need my next dog urn, I will definitely buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: PJJ

customer_reviews.title: Solid and sturdy urn
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a nice, heavy and solid resting place for my little kitty of 19 years. The piece is heavier than it looks and the top screws on nicely. It feels like it will last. If you are reasonable with your expectations for a piece at this price point, you will be VERY pleased. RIP, Basia.
customer_reviews.author: Jared - Colorado Springs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I used this urn for the Sheba, our family dog, a schnizer, that we considered the eight child, my baby sister. We put the urn into the casket with my mother Sheba passed away within months of my mother and father's passing. This little urn was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: If I could give zero stars, I would. ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars, I would. The item arrived defective...the lid could not be unscrewed, and the box was not taped shut. It's possible I received an item that had been previously used or opened, and then returned.
customer_reviews.author: FredaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product. I was able to fit both of our dogs ashes together in the large size, and wrapped their collars around the base.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: This has been the worst year ever for myself as a dog lover
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered three of these in the last year. It tears my guts out to make the decision to put a dog down. This has been the worst year ever for myself as a dog lover. This company has delivered to me with perfect product on time each time. Please keep in mind that I treat my dogs deaths as something serious and I honor each and every one of them as a serious loss. This company has delivered exceptionally for me every time .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You Will Love This Urn, Except...
customer_reviews.text: The urn is very attractive, well made and durable. Lots of people have asked about size -- we bought a large size for Maverick, our 90 lb Golden Retriever. After filling the urn with his cremains, the container was about half full. The description says it is engravable... good luck with that.Since the surface is curved in two directions, I could not find anyone willing to try it. We ended up getting a small piece of "foil tape" engraved ($10.-) and they applied that to the urn --- it looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Received my urn today for my sweet baby girl Hollie... It is Beautiful! Prettier than the picture and very well made.. I am so happy with it, specially because the one that she came in from the vet was really plastic even though they said it was marble yeah NOT... But this urn is just what I needed for my Princess Hollie...You will not be disappointed ....
customer_reviews.author: Dani B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful company wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: It’s never easy to lose a pet, for us they are more than family. I purchased this urn the day I knew our sweet angel was ready to crops the rainbow. It just so happened that she crossed in my arms that very night. She urn was delivered the next day when we took her to be cremated and picked her up the following day. It’s beautiful with attention to the detail, no scratches or blemishes at all and was packed with a heart warming note of sympathy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Urn
customer_reviews.text: Love this urn. Colors are beautiful! It is very sturdy. I bought a large and my dog was 106 lbs when she died.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley L Ingram

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY AND SELECTION TO MATCH ANY BELOVED PET FOR A CLASSY FINAL RESTING PLACE.
customer_reviews.text: PERFECTLY REFLECTS BOTH THE COLOR AND THE PERSONALITY OF MY SUBDUED, CLASSY, EXTRA LARGE, BLACK, GERMAN SHEPHERD, KINGSLEY-MAXIMILLION, WOLF! THANK YOU FOR YOUR CONTINUED QUALITY, SELECTION AND EXCEPTIONAL PRICING AT A TIME OF GRIEF. YOUR QUICK SHIPPING WAS A GOD SEND!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: This is an item I refuse to buy anywhere other than amazon now!
customer_reviews.text: When I looked at this “in store” it was $100+ tax. I paid $38 for this and that alone is worth it. The cost was baffling once I looked in store then immediately looked on amazon. Buy here and save a small fortune.
customer_reviews.author: S JONES

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Urn for our sweet cat Laila. Losing a pet is never easy, this loose was especially hard for us. We decided to get her cremated and the cemetery we were going thru wanted $100 for an urn. After searching on Amazon I found this one. It is beautiful, well made and a great price. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: doglover45

customer_reviews.title: Urn arrived in a very flimsy box but it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Urn arrived in a very flimsy box but it was intact. Problem were the dozens of scratches on the enamel making it totally unusable. I am returning it and wil buy from another seller
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Chan

customer_reviews.title: Great costumer service
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking. Costumer service very helpful. Had trouble opening the urn at first. I was offered a replacement, but hot water and olive oil did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Its a very nice resting place for my cat
customer_reviews.text: I really think its a nice resting place our little Daisy . It really is well made . And Classy looking
customer_reviews.author: Ginger bell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I got this urn for my fur baby Oscar and it is beautiful!! It is larger than the one I bought 5 years ago at the crematorium and cost less. It is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: RIP Johnny - the Urn is very high quality.
customer_reviews.text: I got this urn for my 12 pound Dachshund named Johnny. The urn is of incredibly high quality and opens easily and seals tight. It had enough room for the plastic bag and the remains with room to spare. He was cremated with 2 of his favorite dinosaurs and the small easily fit.
customer_reviews.author: jpv

customer_reviews.title: Beautifull, Sturdy and Well made
customer_reviews.text: I lost my 15 year old Maltese and I already knew I wanted to cremate her. I had a mission to find a great made Urn, to put her to rest in. After a few days of researching and reading reviews, I kept going back to this Urn. My baby was about 4 lbs, so I bought the small in slate pewter. It arrived and I couldn't be happier!! Paws are beautifully engraved and no color mixed what so ever. No sharp pieces, but most importantly the lid screws on tight. I had a TON of room still available to put in a few of her small items.. (bows, pics, hair, ect.) I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive urn purchased, sloppy paint job
customer_reviews.text: The Good: The urn is well-made and fits the remains of the 61lb doberman nicely. The Bad: The urn pictured shows silver paw prints going horizontal around the urn (which I wanted specifically to match another pet urn). I received one with painted white paw prints going up the urn. The paint on the paw prints is very sloppy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Meh..
customer_reviews.text: My mom had to have one of her dogs put down this past Sunday 12/9/18. She had picked this urn because her dogs name was Ruby and the urn was such a beautiful reddish color. It came fast just in time for her to pick up the ashes, the problem was it was full of scratches and scuffs. I hate that it happened that way to someone who was already grieving she ended up buying a similar one at the crematorium. I think there needs to be better quality control on something as important as this.
customer_reviews.author: Saiyan Princess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The urn is well made and very pretty, but not overly decorative or busy looking. Not too light or flimsy feeling but not too heavy. It was the perfect size for a beloved family pet. The paw prints up the side are a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Kren-w

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful place to keep my baby boy's ashes.
customer_reviews.text: Was tough getting bag of ashes in as the mouth of the urn is kind of small, but I split ashes into two bags, sat velvet like bag down in there, then put one bag in, then the next, left just enough room to add the cards that came with the ashes, and tie the velvet like bag. Feels heavy and sturdy, not top heavy though.
customer_reviews.author: Will  E.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and a Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: We recently lost our beloved dog after 14 years of an amazing devoted relationship. Our desire to honor this wonderful animal brought us to search for and purchase two urns. I have never written a review on any purchase, but am compelled to do so about the Best Friend Services urns. Both urns are beautiful. The quality and workmanship is evident in the detail and immaculate finish. Sturdy and well weighted, both more than met our need and display beautifully in our two homes. We could have spent more money, but I seriously believe that we would not have received more quality in doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful way to lay your pet to rest.
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my mom who had to put her 2 dogs down. They weighed 5lbs & 4lbs so when I was reading the description I thought this would hold both (so they were always together from now on) However, we found that they run small and only allowed for 1 to fit in each Urn. Besides, that little mishap, this is a beautiful urn to hold the cremains of your beloved pet. It closes up nicely and gives the appearance of a much more expensive holder than I was expecting for the price. Liked it so much we bought a second one :)
customer_reviews.author: Anna Hay

customer_reviews.title: The first urn that came in though was in very poor condition and I had to send it back
customer_reviews.text: This urn fit the ashes of the 80 pound Doberman perfectly. The first urn that came in though was in very poor condition and I had to send it back. Upon getting the second one, I saw a huge improvement. I will say there are already two magical chips on the paint that exposes the gold underneath the black paint, so I am going to have to be vigilante that it is not knocked or moved too much to prevent any more from happening. Overall, I think it was worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Urn for Pets
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the ashes of my dog. The ashes I received came in a tin box years ago and I’ve been wanting to replace it. Urns can be expensive and this one was within a reasonable price and looks lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Sabaah ZJR

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. I bought extra because I have all of my dogs cremated and I wanted them to all have the same urns. Comes with nice bag to put bag of ashes in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the small and I've placed two of my cats in it. 7lbs and 15lbs I didn't think it was going to be big enough but it's perfect 🐾 I'm very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kim KD

customer_reviews.title: Slate Large Classic Urn
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this urn for my precious GS Sarge who weighed roughly 90 lbs. I came within 2 weeks time and in perfect condition. Although other reviews said the large would give plenty of room as well as the specs I have to say he almost didn't fit so keep that in mind. Still very happy with the purchase and glad my pooch has a beautiful Urn .
customer_reviews.author: A. Welch

customer_reviews.title: I would send request for the amount of paw prints you want.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one and that had 2 sets of paw prints, went to get it engraved and the place local to me messed that up so I had to order another. The second one only had one set of paw prints. Not consistent. Product still looks nice but you don't know if you're getting one or two sets of prints
customer_reviews.author: cougar

customer_reviews.title: It is quite a good size. We feel good about getting the medium
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and ordered the medium for our 20 lb. Schnauzer, Casey. I don't know how small the small is, but we were afraid it would look too small. I had no doubts his ashes would fit in it, but appearance wise on our display shelf, we went with the medium. It is quite a good size. We feel good about getting the medium, BUT, it would have been nice to know the dimensions, because the small may have worked out quite nicely too. Perhaps the Seller will give at least height dimension; it would help out greatly. The urn is absolutely beautiful!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Gale

customer_reviews.title: nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nicely done. Threaded lid works well. Would be nice if they offered a plain urn without paw prints but not complaining. Sorry to anyone that is suffering the loss of a pet. It really sucks.
customer_reviews.author: dos gatos

customer_reviews.title: ... urn came in a timely fashion and was the perfect size for my 20lb pup
customer_reviews.text: The urn came in a timely fashion and was the perfect size for my 20lb pup. The enamel coating had a small area of imperfection and up close you can see the tool marks of where they chipped the paw prints out. From a distance it looks perfect though. The urn is very heavy and the lid screwed on securely which I greatly appreciated. I would most definitely purchase this item again if I ever have the need for another one. It is elegant but sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect in every way!
customer_reviews.text: When I found this urn I was kind of worried about the price and what it's quality would be like.....I can not begin to express how beautiful it is. It's perfect! After the loss of my beautiful girl, I struggled to find something to help ease my pain. Knowing I had a beautiful final resting place waiting for her when I brought her back home made it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hadjikhani

customer_reviews.title: Steurdy and punctual
customer_reviews.text: Arrived 5 days early. I lost my dog to kidney disease August 28 the wich has been very emotional for me. He was the best dog I ever had our time was together was cut short since I adopted him a year ago. I was a truck driver so we traveled everywhere for a good 6 months. Took him to vet cause his started to droop wich want normal they did blood work and a few other tests and discovered that he had kidney disease wich broke my heart. But anyways thanks for the urn
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This might have been a nice urn had it not been engraved. The engraving is terrible and looks very cheap. Unfortunately, my kids opened it and put the ashes in before I saw it. If I had seen it before hand I would have returned it immediately. I should have expected it to be less than satisfactory after they originally sent me a completely different urn than what I had ordered and had to return. Not impressed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Clean and simple yet elegant and eye catching
customer_reviews.text: Love this urn. This is our third one. Very stylish but certainly not gaudy or over-the-top. The two being used sit atop our fireplace mantle and easily fit the decor of the room.
customer_reviews.author: BDF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous. It was perfect for our little guy. Our pup was 20 lbs but we chose to get the medium hoping it’d still be spacious. The ashes actually filled up quite a bit of the urn, but it was still pretty roomy. We got it engraved at a local trophy shop and it looked incredible. I’d had my baby for over 15 years so i needed something truly special for him, and this was definitely a good decision. 🐾💕
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made, and the patina is beautiful. It is bigger than I thought it would be - I probably could have bought the next size down and been okay. I bought the one for up to 30 lbs. and my dog was 38 lbs. when she died. There is lots of room to spare. It is sad when a beloved pet dies, but this urn will keep her well.
customer_reviews.author: Riverwitch

customer_reviews.title: Nice for Dogs Ashes
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice place to leave my "best friend's" ashes. My dog passed away after 16 years. It's a sturdy urn, the lid screws on tightly so if it accidentally gets dropped, Fido does not fly everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: JeanCalif

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Urn!
customer_reviews.text: My dog weighed 17 lbs, and this was the perfect size. I don’t think it would hold much more. It is a beautiful, heavy, well-made urn with paw prints. It also came with a very nice velvety bag. This is a perfect tribute for our loving little dog, and thank you Amazon for providing this option.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made urn
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the quality and price of this pet urn. The top screws on tightly, and I have not found any imperfections in the enamel coating. Quite heavy, and expensive looking- solid brass. Excellent product at a very good price. I would recommend this urn.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Chappell

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure how full it was but it was perfect. the detailing was beautiful and suited our precious ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this for our dog and it worked perfectly. I'm not sure how full it was but it was perfect. the detailing was beautiful and suited our precious baby who was always our little princess. I will definitely buy this again for my other dogs when their time comes.
customer_reviews.author: LNC

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded all expectations!
customer_reviews.text: My only kids have all been 4-legged and furry. 30 years and 5 dogs later l had 4 cardboard boxes containing ashes/remains in plastic bags. As dear and precious as these are to me, I decided to shop for urns. This was the first one I ordered. It exceeded my expectations in beauty, elegance, craftsmanship and value! I have since purchased 2 more with different designs from Best Friend Services and all are exceptional! I WILL order a 4th from them.
customer_reviews.author: skidawg

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Urn
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely beautiful. The blue metallic is gorgeous. I needed something for my precious JD, who was my loving pup for 16 years. I think it suits him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal G

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size arrived.
customer_reviews.text: Urn is beautiful! It arrived in the wrong size. We ordered a large and a medium arrived. it was devastating getting our loved one to fit. Very unhappy!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't believe how fast I received this. Absolutely beautiful, exactly as pictured, and good quality. I'm so happy with this purchase. I bought the medium worried my 50lb dog wouldn't fit in a small - and the medium has plenty room to spare. If I had to guess, I'd go as far as tosay the medium could probably hold up to 100lbs. These are also totally engraveable. Things remembered did mine with no issues and actually commented on how nice it was. Will definitely recommend to all of my pet families.
customer_reviews.author: phiorangeroses

customer_reviews.title: Beauty in the sadness..
customer_reviews.text: My beautiful pit bull Roscoe (yep, a girl) of 18 years passed away.. This urn was the most comforting thing .. I could image her remaining in. Even though the timing is filled with sorrow .. I appreciate the beauty that was crafted & displayed in her honor. You will always have my heart, I miss you. Rest in peace Bug💋
customer_reviews.author: Melony O.

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: It is heavy and sturdy, but the paw print engravings aren't solid lines, they are a bit jagged, which gives it the look of less quality. Also, the color isn't uniform. The one I got has a couple of lighter spots and the color in one of the paw prints runs over the line into the other color. It's okay, but I will be returning it to get something a little nicer.
customer_reviews.author: K.A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Engraved nice
customer_reviews.text: I took it to an engraving shop and it turned out beautiful. It is a wonderful and affordable option. I ordered it Prime from Hawaii and it arrived in approximately a week.
customer_reviews.author: Freund

product_meta.title: Best Friend Services Pet Urn - Ottillie Paws Memorial Pet Cremation Urns for Dogs and Cats Ashes Hand Carved Brass Memory Keepsake Urn
feature_bullets: Solid Aluminum Elegant Design, Solid Hand Carved Paw Prints

Threaded Screw Top Lid for Secure Sealing: The threaded screw top securely contains the remains of your loved one, durable and easy to maintain. This great memorial will honor your Loved pet existence.

Solid Brass, Hand Carved Paw Prints, Express your everlasting love: Express your love for your pet with a beautiful pet urn, give your loved one the quality they deserve - a high quality urn to hold their ashes and act as a fitting tribute to the love you shared
Secure Seal Threaded Lid, Durable Permeant Enamel Slate Finish, Engravable: personalize your pet urn with these beautiful and unique, engravable, pet urns.
Hand Carved Paw Prints, Size for Pet weight - Small 0-30lbs, Med, 31-65lbs, Large 66-110lbs, XL 111-150lbs
